description:
*Realtime updates*
Easily see who is leading your tournament or league and get notified when it changes

*Completely free to use*
No paywalls, ads or limits on the number of players, teams or tournaments. Three are no catches, every feature is 100% free for everyone.

*Choose from many different tournament formats*
Play Stroke Play, Stableford, Scramble, Best Ball, Ryder Cup, Alternate Shot, Mixed, Shamble, 2 Person Scramble and many more!

*Leagues and societies support*
Manage your league events, notify players of new events and see leaderboards for the season

*Full GPS support*
Use high quality satellite imagery to see distances to hazards and pins, measure shot distances and see yardage circles

*Apple Watch app*
See distances to the front, middle and center of the green with a glance at your watch. You can also measure shot distances and enter hole scores without needing to take your phone out of the bag!

*Works for all leagues tournaments*
Perfect for 100+ player multi-day club tournaments, your weekend bachelor party or weekly leagues

*Easily add new players to the tournament*
Regardless of whether they already have a handicap or have the app installed, it's easy to add new players

*Realtime stats*
See who has the best par streak, lowest combined score on par 3s, biggest blowup hole and many more

*Add photos and chat*
Everyone in your tournament or league can add photos and participate in a group chat.

*Over 30k courses in 30+ countries*
Your course is sure to be on the list. And if it's not, it's simple to add a new one. You can also edit your course in the app if the holes change.

*Add games to your scorecard*
Several games to choose from including match play, skins, stableford and low ball / high ball

*Automatic handicap updates*
Squabbit uses the USGA handicap calculation to keep your handicap up to date. Relative handicaps, handicap percentages and per round handicap changes are all supported.

*Export to CSV*
You can export your tournament scorecards to a CSV file to view in a spreadsheet

*HealthKit integration*
The Apple Watch app integrates with HealthKit to start a workout session when you start a new round and end it when you finish. This keeps the watch app in the foreground so that you can check distances to the pin at any time without having to reopen the app.

- Location awareness for improved experiences while onsite at select PGA TOUR events

Spiideo makes sports video recording easy.

Thanks to the pre-installed Spiideo cameras in your arena the Spiideo system is always available. It’s always there, it’s always on. At the touch of a button, coaches can record their team and athletes record themselves for self-led training.
No manual camera handling, no camera man, no handling of video files. All you need is the easy-to-use app. This is sports video recording made easy.

Use the Spiideo app to view videos recorded by Spiideo cameras installed in your arena/stadium.

The official Ikon Pass app is your tool to maximize fun at over 70 Ikon Pass destinations worldwide. Whether you're an Ikon Pass holder or using a local pass or day ticket, the Ikon Pass app helps you make the most of your mountain experience – all in one place.


New Features for 25/26: 

- Find dining, retail, and rentals with interactive maps
- Pay for food and drinks in-app
- Track your mountain credits
- Manage your family’s pass profile
- Check parking availability in real time
- Browse live events at participating destinations


All Features:

Manage your Pass
- See your days remaining and blackout dates 
- Choose favorite destinations and set preferences 
- Keep track of exclusive deals and vouchers
- Track your mountain credits
- Manage your family’s pass profile, pass photos, and more 

Amplify Your Adventure 
- Track stats like vertical, run difficulty, and current altitude 
- Track activity on Apple Watch 
- View weather and condition reports before you go
- Find dining, retail, and rentals with interactive maps
- Pay for food and drinks in-app 
- Map you and your crew on the mountain
- Check parking availability in real time
- Browse live events at participating destinations

Connect With Your Crew 
- Create daily friend groups to message, compare stats, and track each other's locations 
- Challenge the Ikon Pass community on the Leaderboard
- Map you and your crew on the mountain



Ikon Pass helps you navigate at 60+ destinations worldwide. In the 25/26 season, it will replace the local apps at the following mountain destinations:   Arapahoe Basin, Big Bear Mountain Resort, Blue Mountain, Crystal Mountain, Deer Valley Resort, June Mountain, Mammoth Mountain, Palisades Tahoe, Schweitzer, Snow Valley, Snowshoe, Solitude, Steamboat, Stratton, Sugarbush, Tremblant, Winter Park Resort.

PREPARE YOURSELF FOR A VISIT

Força Barça!

The right way to train speed. The SuperSpeed Golf App brings the most comprehensive speed training program into a convenient app for you to work on your golf game whereveThe right way to train speed. The SuperSpeed Golf App brings the most comprehensive speed training program into a convenient app for you to work on your golf game wherever you are. From overspeed training, to ground reaction force training, to fitness and mobility, the SuperSpeed Golf App is your hub for longer drives.

3x Major Champion, Padraig Harrington, calls SuperSpeed Golf, "The easiest way to gain speed."

The SuperSpeed Golf App includes:
- Step-by-step training protocols with videos and guided progression so you know exactly what to do next.
- Detailed data tracking to see your overall speed gains, plus your improvements in specific training areas as your progress through the protocols.
- Customized training program for premium users.
- Premium Physical Assessment to give you the appropriate training recommendations for your game.
- Community leaderboards to see how you stack up against other users in areas like driver speed, ball speed, and distance gained.
- Direct access to the SuperSpeed team for customized help with your training program (coming soon).

THE SUPERSPEED DIFFERENCE
SuperSpeed Golf stands out in the speed training market because of key differentiators in our programs such as:
- Our system is specifically designed to not mess up your swing mechanics because of the precision weighting of our clubs.
- We always include non-dominant swings, because data has shown that working both sides of the body greatly improves the dominant side than just working the dominant side only.
- Results are driven by how your speed translates to the actual golf course with your own clubs.
- Our protocols only take about 15 minutes to complete.
- We utilize a 3 club set so you can easily move between clubs without wasting unnecessary time fiddling with weights and prolonging your rest periods which gets you out of rhythm.

COMPREHENSIVE TRAINING PROGRAMS
The SuperSpeed complete training program includes:
- Training and pre-round style warm ups
- Overspeed training
- Counterweight Training
- Ground Reaction Force for Force Board Pro and Force Pedals
- Balance and Stability with PGA Tour Trainer, Jason Glass
- Rotational Sequencing
- Wrist Mechanics
- Fitness and Mobility with PGA Tour Trainer, Jason Glass
- Grip Strength with the SuperSpeed Squeeze
- Ball Speed Application, including a premium protocol to train ball speed just like Padraig Harrington.

All premium features are available with a month to month or yearly subscription, and include a 14-day trial for the full experience of what your premium app has to offer.

Be the 1st to Know! 365Scores helps you become an EXPERT OF THE GAME with Live Scores, Pre-Game Stats and Predictions, In-Depth Data, News Updates, Upcoming Fixtures, Lineups - and everything else you need to stay connected to your favorite players, teams, and competitions.

Join over 150 million sports fans who rely on 365Scores for real-time updates, pre-game stats and in-depth insights.

* EXTENSIVE SPORTS COVERAGE

Home Screen Widget – Instantly view your personalized My Scores list with live and upcoming games — right on your home screen. Perfect for quick updates and easy access to the matches you care about.
Live Activities – View real-time scores directly on your home screen, even when your phone is locked.

No matter which team you support, 365Scores delivers everything you need: live scores, sports news, squad updates, real-time stats, league tables, transfer updates, and social media buzz.

Get real-time football updates whenever you need them.

Warning! Our live match notifications may be faster than your match stream!

365Scores delivers full coverage of 9 sports: Football, Basketball, Tennis, American Football, Baseball, Handball, Ice Hockey, Rugby and Volleyball - with more than 2,000 competitions, including: UEFA Champions League, English Premier League, Spanish LaLiga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, AFC Champions League, NBA, NFL, NHL, MLB, Wimbledon and much more!

NOVA Soccer Hub App - delivers a complete Soccer tracking experience for fans worldwide. Whether you want to follow live scores, analyze matches, check team lineups, or explore player profiles, this app has it all—wrapped in a clean and intuitive interface.

NOVA Soccer Hub App Key Features:

* Live Match Center - Follow real-time updates with live scores, match time, key events, and team lineups.

* Detailed Statistics - View comprehensive stats including shots, passes, fouls, offsides, possession, and more—visually compared between both sides.

* Fixture & Schedule View - Plan ahead or look back with a calendar-based view of upcoming and past matches sorted by day.

* Predictions & Analytics - Check team performance, form streaks, head-to-head comparisons, and match outcome predictions based on data.

* Point Tables & Standings - Track team positions and points across various leagues and tournaments.

* Team Overview & Profiles - Get venue details, overall performance records, and recent match outcomes. Explore squad rosters categorized by position.

* Player Profiles - Dive into individual player stats, bio details (age, height, nationality, position), recent matches, and league-wise performance breakdown.

* Explore by Country - Search and filter content based on your favorite countries or regions, allowing for a personalized football-following experience.

* Favorites Tab - Save your favorite matches, teams, players, and leagues to quickly access them anytime from one central tab.

Whether you're a casual viewer or a dedicated football analyst, NOVA Soccer Hub App is dedicated to stay informed, entertained, and engaged—no matter the league, team, or competition. Download Nova Soccer Hub app now.

¿Eres aguilucho, liceísta o león? ¡No importa tu color, esta es la app para ti! Lleva toda la emoción de la pelota invernal dominicana en la palma de tu mano con Béisbol Dominicana.

Sigue cada juego de la Liga de Béisbol Profesional de la República Dominicana (LIDOM) y no te pierdas ni un detalle de nuestros peloteros en las Grandes Ligas (MLB). ¿Quieres saber el resultado del juego de anoche? ¿Ver la tabla de posiciones actualizada al momento? ¡Aquí lo tienes todo!

LO QUE TODO FANÁTICO NECESITA:

- Resultados en Vivo y Jugada a Jugada: Siente la emoción de cada partido de la LIDOM como si estuvieras en el play. Marcadores al instante, con cada hit, carrera y ponche.

- Tabla de Posiciones al Día: Revisa la clasificación actualizada después de cada juego. ¿Tu equipo está en el Round Robin? ¡Entérate aquí primero!

- Calendario de Juegos Completo: ¿Cuándo juegan las Águilas y el Licey? ¿Y el Escogido? Consulta el calendario completo de la temporada 2025-2026, con fechas y horarios.

- Líderes de la Liga: ¿Quién es el rey del jonrón? ¿Y el mejor pitcher? Sigue a los líderes en bateo y pitcheo de la LIDOM y MLB.

- Noticias y Novedades: Entérate de todo lo que pasa en el mundo de la pelota: fichajes, lesiones y los últimos rumores.

- Notificaciones Inteligentes: Recibe alertas al empezar el juego de tu equipo, cuando anoten una carrera y con el resultado final. ¡No te perderás de nada!

LA LIDOM COMPLETA EN TU CELULAR:
Águilas Cibaeñas
Estrellas Orientales
Gigantes del Cibao
Leones del Escogido
Tigres del Licey
Toros del Este

¡Descarga la app AHORA y demuestra que eres el fanático número uno de la pelota dominicana!

Watch live football matches on FIFA+ - Stream soccer matches, replays, highlights, scores, and exclusive content anytime, anywhere.
The FIFA+ app is your official home for live football, match replays and the game’s greatest stories. With a bold new design and powerful new features, FIFA+ brings you closer to the sport you love - From FIFA World Cup™ moments to live matches across the globe. This autumn, you can stream the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™, FIFA U-17 Women’s World Cup Morocco 2025 and FIFA U-17 Men’s World Cup Quatar exclusively on Fifa+ in selected countries with many more competitions to come!

Live Football Streaming Worldwide
Stream thousands of live football matches from over 230 competitions and 100+ Football Associations. FIFA+ offers unrivalled coverage of men’s and women’s FIFA tournaments, youth competitions including the FIFA U-20 World Cup Chile 2025™ and FIFA World Cup™ Qualifiers in selected countries.
- Watch live football and soccer matches from around the world
- Follow the road to FIFA World Cup 26™ with live qualifiers and match highlights
- The official home of Classic FIFA World Cup™ matches and original documentaries
- Get live match updates, scores and kick-off alerts instantly

Match Replays, Highlights and FIFA World Cup™ Archive
Missed a game? Relive the match day action with full game replays, match highlights, and expert commentary. Re-watch iconic FIFA World Cup™ moments and explore the football archive to watch historic games and unforgettable goals! With in-depth highlights and detailed post-match analysis, you’ll never miss a thing.

Original Football Content and Stories
Go beyond the pitch with exclusive documentaries, player profiles and untold stories from around the world of football. Discover original series that dive into the stories of legendary players, rivalries and soccer teams from around the world.

Access premium content only available on FIFA+
- Match alerts and notifications: Never miss a goal or kick-off.
- Watch from the start: Rewind live tournament match streams so you can catch up on games
at your convenience.
- Watch next: Get automatic content suggestions tailored to your viewing.
- Improved search and filters: Easily find teams, matches, tournaments and highlights.
- Simple sign-in: Use your FIFA ID to unlock full access to the FIFA+ streaming app.

THE OFFICIAL FOOTBALL STREAMING APP BY FIFA
Stream live football, match replays and FIFA World Cup™ highlights right from your phone. FIFA+ is the only official FIFA app with exclusive access to tournaments and global
competitions.
Download the FIFA+ app today and stream live football, match highlights, documentaries and FIFA World Cup™ content - All in one place. Experience the world’s game, your way.
